texts.text: v0.12.1 alpha build 10 is the tenth build released for v0.12.1.

1 Changes
2 Sounds changed
2.1 Other sounds changed
3 Fixes

Villagers will always become zombie villagers in Hard difficulty
Endermen will now avoid water
Only uses the leaves coloring shaders when the color for a biome actually changes
Only samples the lightmap texture for non-transparent pixels
Updated sounds
Hit sounds were when players took damage in the void.

32 issues fixed
From released versions before 0.12.1

MCPE-7745 – Acacia and dark oak trees act like ladders
MCPE-8742 – Fall damage on ladders and vines
MCPE-9939 – about 3 villages of 4 are empty

MCPE-9555 – the rain and snow cross the blocks
MCPE-9786 – Hoe tools don't show damage/durability when used
MCPE-9883 – Feather Falling don't work
MCPE-9982 – Cannot throw or drop stuff when on hotbar
MCPE-9993 – Unable to throw items on the ground
MCPE-10101 – Entities bounce when walking onto soul sand

Fixed items not dropping from the hotbar
Fixed the player respawning in the Nether after dying in the Nether
Potentially fixed a lot of crashes when closing/reopening the app
Fixed a crash in multiplayer when loading chunks
Fixed a crash with villagers in the Nether
Fixed a black screen crash when opening the game on bad internet connections
Snow doesn't accumulate under stairs
Fixed a crash in the crafting menu
Mob AI no longer consider soul sand or chests to be full-height blocks anymore
Fixed endermen shaking when damaged
NPCs actually notice when crops are ready
Vines can now be placed on leaves
Skulls now look different in multiplayer
Fixed entities climbing dark oak and acacia wood
Fixed a crash when touching the enchant button
Zombie pigmen now die correctly in TNT explosions
The enderman teleport sound now can be heard on clients
Proper handling of input in the port number field
Can now type unicode characters on a sign
World name input doesn't break anymore when using left to go back
Cacti now have the correct particles when broken
Fixed renaming not working in the anvil
Particles don't flicker black anymore
